name: Universe Talk
description:
A Wiener trying to cure a Bratwursts depression,  a stoner guru trying to convince his friend of the beauty of their world - Universe Talk sets no limits for your fantasy. Try to help your friend and you will experience an incredibly versatile multiverse.

Credits:
